text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer…
choice_data_list: Do you think you can make it to today's race?
Do you think you can make it to today's race?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I-I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I-I'm so sorry!
choice_data_list: You don't need to apologize.
You don't need to apologize.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Why?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Why are you so nice to me? Even though I'm such a useless girl.
choice_data_list: You're not a useless girl.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No that's wrong! I'm a useless girl! A useless useless girl!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I've wanted to change. More times than I can count.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Even though I was scared, I left my mom in order to come to Tracen Academy. I've done so much training and even got into races.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But it was all for nothing. Whenever I think about entering into a race I become so scared… during the Selection Race, and even now I'm still scared…
choice_data_list: What are you afraid of?
What are you afraid of?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …That I'll never become a blue rose.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That even if I were to enter a race, I wouldn't be able to make anybody happy.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: If I were to enter a race I would find out the truth. The truth that no matter what I do, I'll always be a useless girl…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: When I think about that I become so scared that I can't stop shaking!…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry Trainer. But it's ok. Because I'm so useless, it's ok to give up on me!
choice_data_list: You were willing to go that far to change.
You were willing to go that far to change.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: huh?
choice_data_list: Being scared just shows how much you wanted to change.
Being scared just shows how much you wanted to change.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But that's…
choice_data_list:
As long as you don't give up on yourself, 
I'll never give up on you.

As long as you don't give up on yourself, 
I'll never give up on you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You're saying that it's ok to not give up…? You really think that I can change…?
choice_data_list: I'll be waiting for you at the race track!
I'll be waiting for you at the race track!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hmmhumhumhmm…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I can do this. I can do this…!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Rice! You came out!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Urara… You waited for me…?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Of course! You're going to do your best right? If that's the case I'll be rooting for you! Go Rice… Go!!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Thank you Urara-chan…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Go Rice… Go!!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haah…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (My hands and legs are still shaking, and my fingers feel frozen…)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (But even still!)
choice_data_list: Rice!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I, I…!
choice_data_list: It's ok! You will definitely become a blue rose!
It's ok! You will definitely become a blue rose!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Right! Here I go!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (I really hate myself)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (Always causing trouble for others, bringing misfortune to people because I'm a useless girl. I've always, always hated myself.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (But even so…!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haah, haaah, haaah…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: This race will be decided at the 3rd corner! Moving up from the outside is the jet black horse girl Rice Shower…!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (I want to change! I refuse to give up! I don't want to be a useless girl any more!!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (I can make people happy, just like the blue rose…!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: With just 200 meters left in this race we have contestant Rice Shower leading the pack! The final stretch is going to be a close match between the 1st and 2nd place!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: With just 100 meters left in the straight, this race is reaching its conclusion!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I can change! I can become a blue rose!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Gooooooal!!! The one who managed to grasp victory in the end was Rice Shower!! It was a hard fight but in the end she managed to keep her lead until the end!
(Wooooooooo!!!)

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Nice going Rice Shower! That was an amazing race!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: That was so exciting! I'll definitely come watch again!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer… Could I make a selfish request?
choice_data_list: A selfish request?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah… If it's ok with you…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Would it be alright if I called you big brother?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Would it be alright if I called you big sister?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Or is that not ok?
choice_data_list: If that's what you want, than I'm ok with that.
If that's what you want, than I'm ok with that.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: R-really!? Than…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Please take care of me from here on out…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Big Brother!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Big Sister!
